function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of 'nature' into buildings may create conditions for the propagation of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread within built environments.","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and sanitation measures to reduce the spread of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, UV sterilization, and antimicrobial building materials.","People":"Occupants of built environments, including residents and workers.","Owner":"Architects, building owners, and facility managers."}]}
